abstract: Lawyers at a U.S. regulator plan to recommend that the government try to block Google’s proposed acquisition of mobile advertising firm AdMob on antitrust grounds, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.
snippet: Lawyers at a U.S. regulator plan to recommend that the government try to block Google’s proposed acquisition of mobile advertising firm AdMob on antitrust grounds, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers at the Federal Trade Commission  plan to recommend that the government try to block Google‘s proposed acquisition of mobile advertising firm AdMob on antitrust grounds, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.

headline.main: Google Deal for AdMob Under the Gun at F.T.C.
